welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Choisy-le-Roi, a charming city known for its rich history and picturesque streets. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in its beauty and enjoy all it has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Main terminal for domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Toussus-le-noble Airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Le Bourget Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Le Bourget Airport, mainly used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, serving a variety of international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest and busiest terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, divided into seven sub-terminals (2A to 2G) serving a mix of international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Charles De Gaulle Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also offered for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
